column4: hello, I am trying to remove an install and I get the following error: http://pastebin.ubuntu.com/38488/
looks like you could modify the file /etc/init.d/ushare that it's complaining about, fix the string quoting and try again.
what would I change the string to?
i've no idea. fix the quoting that the error message complains about. probably means a quotation mark was left off.
